entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,1}{F813,0,152002}I can empathize, I truly can.{F801}I loathe that Tayama as well.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,152003}But task at hand for us now is to{F801}eliminate the Black Samurai--Lilith.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,1}{F813,0,152002}I can empathize, I truly can.{F801}I loathe that Tayama as well.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,152003}But task at hand for us now is to{F801}eliminate the Black Samurai--Lilith.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,3,1,1}{F813,0,152004}Bah...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,152005}Is killing Lilith truly for the best?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,3,1,1}{F813,0,152004}Bah...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,152005}Is killing Lilith truly for the best?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,0,152008}Oh... Ahh... *ahem* It has been some{F801}time since we last spoke, young Samurai.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,152009}It is I, Abbot Hugo.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,0,152008}Oh... Ahh... *ahem* It has been some{F801}time since we last spoke, young Samurai.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,152009}It is I, Abbot Hugo.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,0,152010}I have a message from a certain{F801}someone...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,0,152010}I have a message from a certain{F801}someone...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,0,152011}Return to the Eastern Kingdom of{F801}Mikado at once, and travel to{F801}Shene Duque.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,152012}That is all from me.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,0,152011}Return to the Eastern Kingdom of{F801}Mikado at once, and travel to{F801}Shene Duque.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,152012}That is all from me.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,152013}Well... It's a bit late to say this,{F801}but...{F801}{F802}{F813,1,400051}Congratulations on completing the quest.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,152013}Well... It's a bit late to say this,{F801}but...{F801}{F802}{F813,1,400051}Congratulations on completing the quest.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,170}{F87B,170,6,1,1}{F813,0,152015}Very well. Jonathan, Walter, let us{F801}focus on our duty.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,170}{F87B,170,6,1,1}{F813,0,152015}Very well. Jonathan, Walter, let us{F801}focus on our duty.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,1}{F813,0,152017}Odd, though... Shene Duque?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,152018}What task could await there, at that{F801}nominal holy land...? It is miles{F801}from anything...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,1,1,1}{F813,0,152017}Odd, though... Shene Duque?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,152018}What task could await there, at that{F801}nominal holy land...? It is miles{F801}from anything...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,2,1,1}{F813,0,152007}You... Have you taken leave of your{F801}senses?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,2,1,1}{F813,0,152007}You... Have you taken leave of your{F801}senses?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,400050}I'll register that as a new quest{F801}on the list.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,400050}I'll register that as a new quest{F801}on the list.{F801}
